<h3 id="X38057">X(38057) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(8), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+(b+c)*a^2-3*(b+c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38057) = X(1)-4*X(6666) = X(1)+2*X(24393) = X(7)-4*X(3826) = X(7)+2*X(5220) = X(7)-7*X(9780) = X(9)+2*X(10) = 2*X(9)+X(2550) = 4*X(9)-X(5698) = 3*X(9)+2*X(38201) = 4*X(10)-X(2550) = 8*X(10)+X(5698) = 3*X(10)-X(38201) = 2*X(2550)+X(5698) = 3*X(2550)-4*X(38201) = 3*X(5686)+X(11038) = 2*X(5686)+X(38053) = X(5698)+4*X(38200) = 3*X(5698)+8*X(38201) = X(5759)+5*X(5818) = 2*X(6666)+X(24393) = 2*X(11038)-3*X(38053) = 3*X(38200)-2*X(38201)</b>

<p>
X(38057) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 5686}, {8, 8236}, {9, 38200}, {5657, 5817}, {21153, 38154}, {21168, 38149}, {38059, 38210}, {38108, 38126}, {38113, 38175}<br>
X(38057) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2550, 38200), (6173, 38204), (8236, 1001), (21153, 38130), (38031, 38113), (38037, 38108), (38053, 2), (38108, 38179), (38122, 11231), (38150, 10175), (38200, 10), (38204, 3828)<br>
X(38057) = complement of X(11038)<br>
X(38057) = barycentric product X(10)*X(16053)<br>
X(38057) = trilinear product X(37)*X(16053)<br>
X(38057) = intersection, other than A,B,C, of conics {{A, B, C, X(4), X(16053)}} and {{A, B, C, X(7), X(1839)}}<br>
X(38057) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(38200)<br>
X(38057) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 210, 25568), (2, 3681, 3475), (7, 9780, 3826), (8, 18230, 1001), (9, 10, 2550), (9, 2550, 5698), (10, 18249, 1706), (72, 19855, 28629), (1698, 5223, 142), (1837, 15837, 390), (2346, 5047, 1001), (3305, 25006, 497), (3715, 3925, 329), (3826, 5220, 7), (5880, 15481, 144), (6666, 24393, 1), (38097, 38101, 38025), (38101, 38210, 38059), (38126, 38179, 38037), (38211, 38212, 38175)<br>
